entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Orillia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:57 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Temperature: -1.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -4.2°C
Wind: E 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning then snow changing to rain showers this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late this morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 this morning. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain showers and flurries changing to flurries this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 40 gusting to 70 this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Local blowing snow early in the morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. High plus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
